metadata.title: CVE-2021-37832 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in version 3.0.2 of Hotel Druid whenSQLite is being used as the application database. A malicious attacker canissue SQL commands to the SQLite database through the vulnerableidappartamenti parameter.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
